title: Increase in govt expenditure ... increase in RGDP

content.question: With an upward-sloping short-run aggregate supply curve, an increase in government expenditure will most likely

choices.label: reduce the level of nominal gross domestic product
shift the short-run aggregate supply curve to the right
shift both the aggregate demand curve and the long-run aggregate supply curve to the left

topic.text: 3.6: Changes in the AD-AS Model in the Short Run

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
